T02D3266:19b-1: au tstshushma dzambha la s'a dha nam /
T02D3266:19b-3: dzambha la tshon po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3266:19b-4: dpal dang ldan pa'i dzambha la chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3266:19b-5: mig gsum rtsa lag gis ni spyi gtsug brgyan pa yi //
T02D3266:19b-6: nor bus zhabs dag la ni gtugs pa gang yin pa //
T02D3266:19b-7: phun tshogs phan chen dang ldan mchog gyur thub dbang sras //
T02D3266:19b-8: lha de thub pa gzhon nur gyur pa nyid yin te /
T02D3266:19b-9: bla med yon tan gnyis med pa'i //
T02D3266:19b-11: nyid kyi phun tshogs skye dgu la //
T02D3266:19b-13: de la thog mar re zhig bdag gis dpal dzambha
T02D3266:19b-14: la mnyes par byas la sa dang mngon par rtogs
T02D3266:19b-15: pa'i rim pas de'i bdag nyid du gyur te /
T02D3266:19b-16: skye dgu rnams mngon par mtho ba nag nges par
T02D3266:19b-17: legs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu dgod
T02D3266:20a-0: par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pa dang @20a
T02D3266:20a-1: * // ldan pas snying gi nang gi bug phar
T02D3266:20a-2: dang bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan
T02D3266:20a-3: pa'i yi ge aa klad kor med pa ste /
T02D3266:20a-4: de las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3266:20a-5: de'i dbus su ni yi ge h'um mgo gyen la bstan pa ste /
T02D3266:20a-6: phyi rol gyi nye 'khor na cung zad ser ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro bar gyur ba'o //
T02D3266:20a-7: des bskyed pa ni rdo rje ste dbus kyi rtse
T02D3266:20a-8: mo la 'brel ba'i rtse dgu pa steng dang 'og
T02D3266:20a-9: gcig tu byas pas gsung rab yan lag dbu rnam
T02D3266:20a-10: par dag pa'o // kha dog ni yi ge h'um bzhin du bya ste /
T02D3266:20a-11: lte ba'i nang du chud pa'i zla ba la gnas
T02D3266:20a-12: par de dang 'dra ba'i h'um dang ldan pa bsgom
T02D3266:20a-13: par bya pa'o // de nas yi ge h'um dang
T02D3266:20a-14: rdo rje las 'od zer spros par gyur pas aom
T02D3266:20a-15: aa: zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3266:20a-16: ba can gyis phyogs bcur sems can rnams kyi don
T02D3266:20a-17: mdzad pa'i dzam bha la'i sku mtha' yas ba mar
T02D3266:20a-18: me gcig nas gcig tu mched ba'i tshul gyis spyan
T02D3266:20a-19: drangs la mdun du de'i sku gcig la rnam par
T02D3266:20a-21: 'od zer gyis nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa rnam
T02D3266:20a-22: pa lnga dang sdig pa bshad pa dang ji srid
T02D3266:20a-23: du btang snyoms kyi bar du'o //
T02D3266:20a-24: de'i rjes thogs la h'um dang rdo rje'i 'od zer
T02D3266:20a-25: rnams mtha' dag lus kyi nang du bstims la spros
T02D3266:20a-26: pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyis nang stong
T02D3266:20a-27: pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa zla ba
T02D3266:20a-28: dad rdo rje dang sa bon dang 'od zer te
T02D3266:20a-29: / aom aa: bya ba 'di spros pa des legs
T02D3266:20a-30: par drangs la bcom ldan 'das gzhug par bya ba'o
T02D3266:20a-31: / // legs par bcug pa'i rjes la skad cig
T02D3266:20a-32: gis zla ba la sogs pa las legs par grub
T02D3266:20a-33: pa'i bcom ldan 'das tshon bor bdag nyid de lo
T02D3266:20a-34: lnga lon pa'i gzhon nu'i rnam pa bongs thung ba
T02D3266:20a-35: / // / sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i zla
T02D3266:20a-36: ba'i steng na rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan cing
T02D3266:20a-37: rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa kha nas
T02D3266:20a-38: rin po che skyugs pa lus kyi mdog ser po
T02D3266:20a-39: phyi bkan la nyal ba'i nor sbyin dpral bar ni
T02D3266:20a-41: rkang ba gnyis g-yon pas gnon par mdzad pa zhabs
T02D3266:20a-42: g-yas pa bskum pas gyen du 'jog pa gcer bu
T02D3266:20a-43: rtags gyen la langs pa gsus pa 'jol ba /
T02D3266:20a-44: khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa phyag g-yas pas thugs
T02D3266:20b-0: kar bsnams pa la zhal mngon du @20b phyogs nas
T02D3266:20b-1: gzigs pa / kha 'og tu bstan nas rin po
T02D3266:20b-2: che'i tshogs skyugs par gyur pa'i ne'u le brla g-yon
T02D3266:20b-3: pa la legs par 'khril bar phyag g-yon pas bsnams
T02D3266:20b-4: gzigs pa / pa / nang che ba'i rna ba
T02D3266:20b-5: ma phug pa zla ba tshes ba lta bu'i zhal
T02D3266:20b-6: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D3266:20b-7: spyan gnyis dmar zhing zlum ba khro gnyer dang ldan
T02D3266:20b-8: pa dpral bar thod leb mas bcings pa'i dbu skra
T02D3266:20b-10: sa gnon gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i thub pa
T02D3266:20b-11: mi bskyod pa mthing nag gis dbu la rgyan btab
T02D3266:20b-12: pa / ta m'a la sngon po dang dga' bos dgu skra bcings pa /
T02D3266:20b-13: 'jog po dmar pos rna ba'i gdub kor du byas
T02D3266:20b-14: pa padma dkar po dang padma chen pos do shal
T02D3266:20b-15: byas pa d'ur ba ljang gu dang karko ta ka
T02D3266:20b-16: tshangs pa'i dag byed du byas pa nor rgyas dkar
T02D3266:20b-17: pos smad kar byas pa 'khyil pa legs pa dang
T02D3266:20b-18: padmas rkang rgyan du byas pa /
T02D3266:20b-19: dung skyong ser pos lag gdub tu byas pa dud
T02D3266:20b-20: mdog / kar bur dang rigs ldan gyi dbu rgyan
T02D3266:20b-21: du byas pa / kha dog mthing nag la phyi
T02D3266:20b-22: rol gyi nye 'khor cung zad ser ba'i 'od zer
T02D3266:20b-23: ser po'i tshogs rnams spro bar byed par bsgoms la
T02D3266:20b-24: du byas pa / / dpral ba dang kha dang
T02D3266:20b-25: dpung pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang g-yon pa
T02D3266:20b-26: dang snying ga dang rdo rje'i steng dang /
T02D3266:20b-27: brla g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang rkang pa g-yas
T02D3266:20b-28: g-yon rnams kyi nang gi sbubs na gnas pa'i zla
T02D3266:20b-29: ba tshes pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la aom dzambha la
T02D3266:20b-30: dza lendra ye sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i yi ge
T02D3266:20b-31: ser po 'od ser po dang ldan pa blta bar
T02D3266:20b-32: bya ba'o // de'i rjes la sna bug gi rlung
T02D3266:20b-33: phyir 'byung ba'i dus su aom la sogs pa rnams
T02D3266:20b-34: kyi 'od zer dang snying ga'i rdo rje dang h'um
T02D3266:20b-35: gi 'od zer gyis kyang phyogs rnams su spros pas
T02D3266:20b-36: reg pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi skur byas
T02D3266:20b-37: pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las
T02D3266:20b-38: byung ba dbugs 'jug pa'i dus su yi ge h'um
T02D3266:20b-39: la legs par bcug la sems gnas par bya ba'i
T02D3266:20b-40: don du mnan par bya ba'o //
T02D3266:20b-41: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i rin
T02D3266:20b-42: po che sna tshogs pa rnams kyang klu dang ne'u
T02D3266:20b-43: le dang nor sbyin rnams kyi khar legs par gzhug
T02D3266:20b-44: par bya ba'o // yang rlung phyir rgyu ba na
T02D3266:20b-45: ni klu la sogs pa rnams kyis med pa'i rin
T02D3266:20b-46: po che rnams mdun gyi g-yon du bsgom par bya'o
T02D3266:21a-1: de ltar yang dang yang du kun du spro ba
T02D3266:21a-2: dang legs par bsdu ba la sogs pa yang bya'o
T02D3266:21a-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D3266:21a-5: na mo na ni bha dr'a ya rma h'a yaksha se na pa ta ye /
T02D3266:21a-6: aom dzambha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3266:21a-7: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3266:21a-8: bgod pa'i yi ge bcu po'i sngags kyang rung ngo //
T02D3266:21a-9: chu sbyin pa'i dus su ni lag pa g-yas pa'i
T02D3266:21a-10: kha bkan pa'i dbus su yi ge bam gyi 'od
T02D3266:21a-11: zer gyis lag pa bum pa bzang po bzhin du
T02D3266:21a-12: byas shing lag mgul du ni yi ge aom gyi
T02D3266:21a-13: 'od kyis lag gdub kyi rnam pa dang ldan bar
T02D3266:21a-14: te / bam gyi dbus su ni dzi ngo //
T02D3266:21a-15: mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u
T02D3266:21a-16: chud dang mthe bong rnams kyi rtse mo la ni
T02D3266:21a-17: dzambha la dza lendra'i yi ge rnams rim pa bzhin
T02D3266:21a-18: no // aom dang bam gnyis kyi bar du ni ya'o //
T02D3266:21a-19: yi ge aa'i g-yas dang g-yon gyi glo gnyis la ni yi ge sv'a dang h'a'o //
T02D3266:21a-20: yi ge la sogs pa de dag rnams ni rang
T02D3266:21a-21: rang gi gnas kyi sbubs na zla ba la gnas
T02D3266:21a-22: pa ste / kha dog ser po dang 'od zer
T02D3266:21a-23: po can du bsgoms la chu dang bcas pa me
T02D3266:21a-24: tog gi snying po can gyi lag pa kha dang
T02D3266:21a-26: aom aindra ni mu kham bhra ma ri sv'a h'a /
T02D3266:21a-27: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan bdun du mngon par bsngags so //
T02D3266:21a-28: de'i rjes thogs la lag pa brkyang bas sbyin par
T02D3266:21a-29: gyur pa na chu rang gi kha nas zhugs par
T02D3266:21a-30: gyur te yi ge dzam gyi 'od zer dang snying
T02D3266:21a-31: ga na gnas pa'i dza dang rdo rje dang yi
T02D3266:21a-32: ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis kyang byas pas rdo
T02D3266:21a-33: rje kha dog ser po'i kha nas nges par byung
T02D3266:21a-34: ste / lag pa nas bab pas skad cig gis
T02D3266:21a-35: mdun du bsgoms nas mdun gyis phyogs pa de'i 'am
T02D3266:21a-36: ste / / bcom ldan 'das 'di'i sku gzugs kyang rung ste /
T02D3266:21a-37: zhal gyi sgo aom dzlum sv'a h'a /
T02D3266:21a-38: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D3266:21a-39: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D3266:21a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang lan bdun du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3266:21a-41: yang na mo ratna zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D3266:21a-42: lan cig brjod pas bu ram dang bsres pa'i skya
T02D3266:21a-43: khur ram 'bru la sogs pa'i gtor ma bcom ldan
T02D3266:21a-45: de dag de ltar nus pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3266:21a-46: du thun gsum mam thun gcig la rjes su bsgrub
T02D3266:21b-0: par bya zhing / bstod pa dang smon @21b lam yang gdab par bya'o //
T02D3266:21b-1: de'i rjes la bsgoms pa'i bcom ldan 'das aom badzra mu:zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3266:21b-2: gzhan yang smin drug dang rta dang sa ga dang chu stod rnams sam /
T02D3266:21b-3: nya gzhan gang yang rung ba'am /
T02D3266:21b-4: dge ba'i nyi ma gzhan dag la yang rung ste /
T02D3266:21b-5: rdo ba rangs par skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das
T02D3266:21b-6: kyi skur bskyed par bya zhing legs par yang mchod
T02D3266:21b-7: la / bzo bo bsnyen gnas blangs par gyur pas
T02D3266:21b-8: nyi ma gcig gnyis la sku bzhengs su gsol bar
T02D3266:21b-9: bya ste dpa' bo nyo ba ni ma yin pas
T02D3266:21b-10: so byas la yang bdag nyid bzhin du bcom ldan
T02D3266:21b-11: 'das kyi sku rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D3266:21b-12: yi ge dgod pa dang bcas pa rnam par bsgom
T02D3266:21b-13: la / la / chu sbyin pa la sogs pas
T02D3266:21b-14: mnyes par bya ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gdams
T02D3266:21b-15: la / la / dag go // de'i tshe na ni gshegs su gsol bar mi bya ste /
T02D3266:21b-16: sku gzugs kyi sku'i bcom ldan 'das ni gang gi
T02D3266:21b-17: phyir rtag tu gnas pa yin pas bsnyen bkur bar
T02D3266:21b-18: bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T02D3266:21b-19: pandi ta aa bha ya ka ra gu guptas mdzes
T02D3266:21b-20: par sbyar ba'i dzambha la tshon po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs
